document_data.name: Born to be Wild
document_data.mainbody: '''''Born to be Wild''''' was a small book of erotic fiction found in the [[Western Heartlands]], made without the approval of [[Volo]] or [[Elminster]].
document_data.Contents: The pamphlet contained a magical adventure wherein Elminster lambasted Volo over the inaccuracies and fiction in his accounts of the mating rituals found in the [[Feywild]]. The good sage then proceeded to demonstrate the true facts of the matter, described with highly evocative, imagination-stirring prose.
document_data.History: There was a copy of this book in the "stern librarian" themed room in the [[Sharess' Caress]] brothel in [[1492 DR]].
